learning_strategy:
Initial Assessment: User responds well to direct questions and repeated prompts. Visual metaphors (Antennas/Signs) are highly effective. 

Goal: Monitor sentence structure and gradually increase complexity.

parent_inputs.content: Focus on encouraging him to use full sentences.
parent_inputs.alexa_response: I will gently prompt for full sentences during our chats, especially when he requests things.

progress_log.note: Session Summary: We practiced the word 'diligent' today. He struggled initially but successfully used it in a sentence about his guitar practice. I also noticed him self-correcting a sentence fragment into a full sentence once.
